title: E272 The Most Emo Cryptid and the Emcyclopedia
description: It's episode 272 and the ice worms are back again... join us on a wild journey as Em takes us to the forests of northern Pennsylvania to cover the much-requested, very teary-eyed cryptid, the Squonk. Then Christine covers a topic Em forgot they requested: Hybristophilia and the people who fall in love with serial killers. And is the Squonk and their tear-salted footprints related to America's Hircine Shifter? ...and that's why we drink!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Em Schulz, Christine Schiefer, Eva Gross)
